title: Sigma Sigmax® Essential Kit 10 Brushes
description:
The Sigma Beauty Sigmax Essential Kit contains ten brushes specially designed for a high definition, flawless makeup application. The brushes in this kit feature exclusive Sigmax fibers, uniquely designed to apply powder, cream and liquid products without absorption into the bristles. The Sigmax Essential Kit has everything you need to achieve a perfect and flawless face.

Brushes Included:

F80 - Flat KabukiTM: Application of liquid or cream products to flat areas of the face such as the forehead and cheeks.
F82 - Round KabukiTM: Blend mineral products onto the skin.
F84 - Angled KabukiTM: Buff cream blush or bronzer onto the skin.
F88 - Flat Angled KabukiTM: Blends foundation easily onto hard to reach areas of the face. Angle fits all areas of the face seamlessly. Works especially well on cheekbones and contours of the nose.
F86 - Tapered KabukiTM: Apply cream and liquid foundations onto the harder to reach contours of the face.
P80 - Precision FlatTM: Stipple concealer on sun spots, blemishes, and other small imperfections.
P82 - Precision RoundTM: Apply eye shadow base or primer onto the lid.
P84 - Precision AngledTM: Apply product to areas such as the sides of the nose and the hollows of the cheeks.
P86 - Precision TaperedTM: Exact placement of concealer in harder to reach areas such as around the eyes and nose, chin, and around the mouth.
P88 - Precision Flat AngledTM: Use for precise application of concealer products anywhere on the face. Works particularly well around the eyes and nose.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma Dry'n Shape®
description:
The Sigma Beauty Dry'n Shape was specially designed to completely dry and shape your most dense brushes within 4 to 6 hours, guaranteed. The Dry'n Shape provides the necessary pressure to bristles to re-shape them while quickly and efficiently removing water from every bristle. It is an easy, quick, and effective way to quickly dry and shape your makeup brushes. Patent pending.

BRUSH CLEANING INSTRUCTIONS:
WASH - Wet brush head with warm water and work a small amount of cleanser into bristles. Use the Sigma SpaTM Brush Cleaning Glove to thoroughly wash brush until fully clean. Rinse brush and squeeze out any excess water.
SHAPE - Place your clean, damp brushes into the Dry'n Shape using the smallest band the brush will fit into, making sure that all bristles are firmly compressed.
DRY - After 4 to 6 hours, your brushes will be completely dry and reshaped to their original form - guaranteed!

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Z Palette Dome Makeup Palette, Black
description: The patented Z Palette is an exclusive custom palette perfect for display and color comparison. It features a sleek and clean design that offers the strength of a plastic palette, while using eco-friendly recyclable materials. Fold the top portion completely under the bottom portion for a space saving feature on your vanity or makeup station. The Z Palette is the only one of its kind that includes both a clear window and an open magnetic base to fit any size shadow, blush, bronzer, and even some foundations. The Dome palette is created deep enough to fit your mineralized and baked dome-shaped shadows.

title: Vera Mona Color Switch Duo
description: Color Switch Duo allows you to switch the color on your eyeshadow brushes by simply glidding the brush against the surface of the black sponge.  The Duo also has a wet sponge in the center for wet eyeshadow application.
